column1: Uchi////It was such a great experience for all the food. For example the scallop rock
column2: the server bring out a super HOT rock... don't touch it. Place the scallop on the rock to cook it and eat it. The scallop was season perfectly and when cooked on the rock to give it the scallop a nice seared. Its pretty pricey
column3: but its the experience and the company that is joining you that you're paying for. Since we ordered a lot
column5: but its not like I come here everyday so its okay. I did notice that they have happy hour
column6: so if you never been and want to give it a try without breaking the bank come during happy hour. Of course happy hour menu is limited.
